name: Infected (Infected_123)
description:
INFECTED help the child survive and escape from the deadly island!

This game tells the story of a child who is stranded on an island that contains a city that has been damaged and full of monsters. He realized that he had to leave the island immediately. But it won't be easy because the monsters are already aware of his presence. Therefore, you must bring this child to be able to seek help and escape from the monsters.

How to play this game?
  •    W A S D             :  Player movement
  •            E                     :  Pick item / enter the house
  •            F                     :  Use item
  •   Click left            :  Attack
  •       Shift                  :  Run
  • Change item      : 1 2 3
